remarks: Zorn's Lemma.  If the union of every chain (with respect to inclusion) in a set belongs to the set, then the set contains a maximal element. Theorem 6M of [Enderton] p. 151.  This version of ~ zorn avoids the Axiom of Choice by assuming that ` A ` is well-orderable.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.)
